name: Azure
description: Extensive experience with Azure cloud services, including Kubernetes and DevOps automation. Proficient in designing and managing cloud environments to support scalable and secure applications.

name: iOS Development
description: Developed iOS-centric AI vision platforms and mobile applications. Skilled in integrating iOS apps with backend services and optimizing performance for mobile devices.

name: Kubernetes
description: Expertise in Kubernetes for container orchestration, managing microservices, and automating deployments. Used extensively in DevOps and cloud architecture roles.

name: DevOps
description: Specialized in DevOps practices including CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and automation. Experienced in GitLab CI/CD, Ansible, Terraform, and GitHub Actions.

name: Cloud Architecture
description: Proficient in designing and implementing cloud architectures for scalable, high-performance applications. Skilled in using AWS, Azure, and GCP for distributed cloud solutions.

name: Machine Learning
description: Experience in applying machine learning algorithms for vision systems, data extraction, and AI-driven applications. Familiar with tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Azure ML.

name: Microservices
description: Design and implementation of microservice architectures for scalable, modular applications. Skilled in containerization, API development, and service orchestration.

name: Software Architecture
description: Extensive experience in designing software architecture for complex systems, ensuring scalability, security, and performance. Involved in full-stack development and backend design.

name: System Integration
description: Proficient in integrating various systems and technologies, particularly in cloud, AI, and vision systems. Expertise in connecting hardware, software, and APIs for seamless operation.

name: Project Management
description: Strong project management skills, including leading cross-functional teams, managing project timelines, and delivering high-quality products on time.

name: Data Science
description: Skilled in data analysis, statistical modeling, and data visualization. Experienced in using Python and PostgreSQL for data manipulation and insight extraction.

name: Deep Learning
description: Expert in deep learning techniques for image recognition, natural language processing, and predictive analytics. Familiar with neural network architectures such as CNNs, RNNs, and Transformers.

name: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
description: Proficient in developing NLP models for text analysis, sentiment detection, and language generation. Experienced with NLP libraries like Hugging Face Transformers.

name: AI Model Deployment
description: Experienced in deploying AI models to production environments using containerization, serverless architectures, and cloud-based services such as Azure ML and AWS SageMaker.

name: Big Data Analytics
description: Skilled in big data tools and technologies such as Snowflake for large-scale data processing and analytics.

name: Predictive Modeling
description: Expertise in creating predictive models using regression, classification, and time-series analysis. Proficient in applying these models to business and operational decision-making.

name: Data Engineering
description: Proficient in designing data pipelines, ETL processes, and data warehousing solutions to support analytics and machine learning applications.

name: GitOps
description: Expertise in GitOps methodologies for continuous deployment and infrastructure automation. Skilled in using ArgoCD and GitLab for managing CI/CD workflows.

name: Containerization
description: Proficient in Docker and Podman for containerizing applications, ensuring consistent environments across development, testing, and production.

name: Platform Engineering
description: Experience in building and managing developer platforms that enhance productivity and ensure scalability, leveraging tools like GitLab-CI, OpenShift, and Atlassian.

name: CI/CD Pipelines
description: Specialized in setting up and optimizing CI/CD pipelines using GitLab, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions for streamlined code integration and deployment.

name: Version Control
description: Extensive use of GitLab and GitHub for version control, collaboration, and continuous integration. Skilled in managing code repositories and branching strategies.

name: Monitoring and Observability
description: Experience with SonarQube, Prometheus, and Grafana for code quality checks, monitoring, and maintaining application health.

name: Database Management
description: Skilled in managing and optimizing databases including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and other NoSQL solutions for high performance and scalability.

name: Semantic Kernel & Autogen
description: Proficient in Semantic Kernel and Autogen tools for advanced AI model development and data-driven insights generation.

name: OpenAI Integration
description: Experience in integrating OpenAI models for natural language processing, automation, and enhancing platform capabilities.

name: Robotics
description: Extensive experience in robotics, including programming and integration of industrial robots such as KUKA, Staubli, and Universal Robots. Expertise in collaborative robotics and vision-guided systems.

name: SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping)
description: Proficient in SLAM technologies for robotics applications, enhancing navigation and mapping capabilities in dynamic environments.

name: Vision Guided Robotics
description: Skilled in implementing vision-guided robotic systems using technologies such as Structured Light, TOF 3D Vision, and Stereoscopic 3D Vision.

name: ROS (Robot Operating System)
description: Experienced in using ROS for robot programming, integration, and control, facilitating advanced robotic applications and automation.

name: Industrial Automation
description: Expert in industrial automation systems including PLC programming, wiring harness design, and integrating robotics with manufacturing and warehouse automation solutions.

name: 3D Vision Systems
description: Proficient in various 3D vision systems including Structured Light, TOF (Time-of-Flight), Stereoscopic Vision, and LIDAR for robotics and automation.

name: Nvidia Jetson Platform
description: Extensive experience with Nvidia Jetson platforms including Jetson TX2, for deploying AI and computer vision applications in robotics.

name: CUDA
description: Skilled in using CUDA for GPU-accelerated computing, optimizing performance for robotics and computer vision applications.

name: OpenCV and Computer Vision
description: Proficient in OpenCV for computer vision tasks, including image processing, feature extraction, and integrating vision into robotic systems.

name: PCL (Point Cloud Library)
description: Expert in using PCL and Open3D for 3D data processing and manipulation, essential for robotics and 3D vision applications.

name: CAM/CAD Software
description: Proficient in CAM and CAD software including Inventor, Fusion 360, and RoboDK for designing robotic parts, simulations, and control systems.

name: Manufacturing and Warehouse Automation
description: Experience in designing and implementing automation solutions for manufacturing and warehouse operations, including ASRS and robotic integration.

name: Coordinate Transformations
description: Skilled in coordinate transformations for robotics, essential for aligning robotic movements with sensor data and real-world tasks.

name: Intel Realsense
description: Proficient in using Intel Realsense cameras for depth perception and 3D vision in robotics and automation applications.

name: Swarm Robotics
description: Expertise in swarm robotics, focusing on the coordination and control of multiple robots for collaborative tasks.

name: UAS (Unmanned Aerial Systems)
description: Proficient in the design, deployment, and operation of UAS, including integration of autopilot software and advanced sensors.

name: Autopilot Software
description: Skilled in developing and implementing autopilot software for robotics and unmanned aerial systems, enhancing autonomous control capabilities.

name: Multispectral Imaging
description: Experience in multispectral imaging techniques for advanced data analysis and environmental sensing applications.

name: ONYX AI Runtime
description: Proficient in using ONYX AI Runtime for deploying machine learning models in real-time applications.

name: LLMs and SLMs (Large and Small Language Models)
description: Extensive experience in developing, deploying, and optimizing large and small language models for various NLP tasks.

name: Prompt Engineering
description: Expertise in prompt engineering techniques for optimizing AI model responses in natural language processing applications.

name: Azure AI Search
description: Skilled in leveraging Azure AI Search for creating intelligent search solutions with integrated AI capabilities.

name: Cosine Similarity Search
description: Proficient in implementing cosine similarity search techniques for data retrieval and AI applications.

name: Azure Document Intelligence
description: Experience in using Azure Document Intelligence to extract, analyze, and process data from unstructured documents.

name: Azure CLI
description: Proficient in using Azure CLI for managing Azure resources, automating workflows, and optimizing cloud operations.

name: Microservices
description: Extensive experience in designing, developing, and managing microservices architectures to build scalable, modular applications.

name: Queues
description: Skilled in using message queues for asynchronous communication between services, enhancing system scalability and reliability.

name: DevSecOps
description: Expertise in integrating security practices into DevOps workflows, focusing on automating security checks and ensuring compliance.
